name: Adding Calculator Pro
author: mrqd9
description:
Adding Calculator Pro is a specialized adding machine designed for business owners, accountants, and retail professionals in India. Unlike standard calculators, this app provides a continuous "paper-tape" history of your entries, ensuring you never lose track of a long sequence of additions.
​Key Features:
​Indian Currency Formatting: Displays totals in the ₹ Lakh/Crore system for intuitive reading.
​Virtual Paper Tape: View every entry in a scrollable history list to verify your math.
​Swipe-to-Delete: Accidentally added a wrong number? Simply swipe a row to remove it from the total.
​Billing Ready: Generate clean, professional summaries of your calculations.
​Print & PDF: Optimized print layout allows you to print summaries or save them as PDFs for clients.
​Archive & History: Save your sessions and restore them later for auditing.
​Privacy First: No internet required. All data stays on your device.
​Perfect for shopkeepers.
